ygData.subject: RE: Resist rates...
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been quick to cry secret nerf in the past and been proven wrong.  I have a suspicion that some of the things we encounter and attribute to nerfing may
ygData.messageBody:
I have been quick to cry "secret nerf" in the past and been proven wrong. I
have a suspicion that some of the things we encounter and attribute to
nerfing may be variances in the crummy random number generator of the game.


This is just speculation of course and you can take it with a grain of salt.


Case in point: have you ever noticed how some days you can practice a skill
until you are blue in the face and never gain a point while other days you
may go up 3 points within 30 seconds?

Maybe Verant is using loaded dice ;-)

-Faras "the suspicious" Tar'Linedhel
E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Steven S. Klug [mailto:sklug@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, August 31, 1999 4:00 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Resist rates...
>
>
> From: "Steven S. Klug" <sklug@...>
>
> I played for a while at lunch (got level 26! YAY!) and I'd
> have to agree
> with whoever posted that the resist rates have gone up. I
> was fighting
> blue gobs in Perma, and they were resisting my chains 3 out
> of 4 attempts.
> They were resisting discord 1 out of 2 attempts. This has
> NEVER happend
> before. I have been playing in perma for the last week, and this is a
> definite change. This was BEFORE I got my level btw, just to
> remove any
> excess variables.
>
> Steven S. Klug
> -- sklug@...
>
